languages.text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Все существа, которые перемещаются в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}область действия{/g} гранаты выполняют проверки Воли, Выносливости и Силы на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}.
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Воли цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожность{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Выносливости цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Силы цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Creates an area of smoke which lasts for 4 rounds. All creatures that enter the area or start their turn inside it must pass Toughness, Strength, and Willpower tests.
<indent=5%>- On a failed Toughness test the target becomes blinded for 2 rounds</indent>
<indent=5%>- On a failed Strength test the target becomes slowed for 2 rounds</indent>
<indent=5%>- On a failed Willpower test the target becomes disturbed for 2 rounds</indent>

<indent=5%>- On a failed Strength test the target becomes slowed for 2 rounds</indent>
<indent=5%>- On a failed Willpower test the target becomes disturbed for 2 rounds</indent>

-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Создает область задымления на 4 раунда. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, должен пройти проверку Выносливости, Силы и Воли.
<indent=5%>- При провале проверки Выносливости цель получает эффект ослепления на 2 раунда.</indent>
<indent=5%>- При провале проверки Силы цель получает эффект замедления на 2 раунда.</indent>
<indent=5%>- При провале проверки Воли цель получает эффект тревожности на 2 раунда.</indent>

Создает область задымления на 4 раунда. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, должен пройти проверку Выносливости, Силы и Воли.
<indent=5%>- При провале проверки Выносливости цель получает эффект ослепления на 2 раунда.</indent>
<indent=5%>- При провале проверки Силы цель получает эффект замедления на 2 раунда.</indent>
<indent=5%>- При провале проверки Воли цель получает эффект тревожности на 2 раунда.</indent>

Все существа, которые перемещаются в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}область действия{/g} гранаты выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} Выносливости, Силы и Воли со штрафом −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}.
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Выносливости цель получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Силы цель получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>
-<indent=5%>При провале проверки Воли цель получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g} на 2 раунда.</indent>

languages.text:
如果有任何生物进入这片{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}区域{/g}，或在这片区域内开始回合，则需要进行坚韧、力量与意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}减值。
-<indent=5%> 未能通过坚韧检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过力量检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过意志检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
languages.original_text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
如果有任何生物进入这片{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}区域{/g}，或在这片区域内开始回合，则需要进行坚韧、力量与意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}减值。
-<indent=5%> 未能通过坚韧检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过力量检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%> 未能通过意志检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>

制造一片烟雾区域，所有进入这片区域的生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}。
-<indent=5%>未能通过坚韧检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
-<indent=5%>未能通过力量检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%>未能通过意志检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>

制造一片烟雾区域，所有进入这片区域的生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}。
-<indent=5%>未能通过坚韧检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
-<indent=5%>未能通过力量检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>
-<indent=5%>未能通过意志检定的目标会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}状态，持续两轮。</indent>

languages.text:
Todas las criaturas que entran en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de esta granada deben superar {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} de Fuerza, Resistencia y Voluntad con una penalización de −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} .
-<indent=5%>Si fallan la prueba de Resistencia, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegadas{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si fallan la prueba de Fuerza, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizadas{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si fallan la prueba de Voluntad, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbadas{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
languages.original_text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Crea una zona de humo que dura 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Todas las criaturas que empiecen su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en el interior o entren en ella deben superar pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
<indent=5%>- Fallar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Resistencia hace que el objetivo quede {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 2 asaltos</indent>
<indent=5%>- Fallar la prueba de Fuerza hace que el objetivo quede {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 2 asaltos</indent>
<indent=5%>- Fallar la prueba de Voluntad hace que el objetivo quede {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g} durante 2 asaltos</indent>

Todas las criaturas que entran en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de esta granada deben superar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} .
-<indent=5%>Si fallan la prueba de Resistencia, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegadas{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si fallan la prueba de Fuerza, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizadas{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si fallan la prueba de Voluntad, quedan {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbadas{/g} durante 2 asaltos.</indent>

languages.text:
このグレネードで出来た{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}に足を踏み入れる全てのクリーチャーは、 −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}ペナルティがあるTGH、STR、WPの{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。
-<indent=5%>耐久力判定に失敗すると、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>腕力判定に失敗すると、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>意志力判定に失敗すると、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}状態になる。</indent>
languages.original_text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
4{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続する煙幕エリアを生成する。エリア内に立ち入った、またはエリア内で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始したすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}判定を行わなければならない。
<indent=5%>- タフネス{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗時、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。</indent>
<indent=5%>- 腕力判定に失敗時、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}状態になる。</indent>
<indent=5%>- 意志力判定に失敗時、ターゲットは2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}状態になる。</indent>

このグレネードで出来た{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}に足を踏み入れる全てのクリーチャーは、 −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。
-<indent=5%>耐久力判定に失敗すると、ターゲットは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>腕力判定に失敗すると、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>意志力判定に失敗すると、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}状態になる。</indent>

このグレネードで出来た{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}に足を踏み入れる全てのクリーチャーは、 −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}がある{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。
-<indent=5%>耐久力判定に失敗すると、ターゲットは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>腕力判定に失敗すると、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>意志力判定に失敗すると、2ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}状態になる。</indent>

languages.text:
Alle Kreaturen, die in den {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} dieser Granate geraten, müssen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Proben{/g} auf Zähigkeit, Stärke und Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von −<u>{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} bestehen.
-<indent=5%>Scheitert die Zähigkeit-Probe, wird das Ziel 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Misslingt die Stärke-Probe — 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Mislingt die Willenskraft-Probe — 2 Runden lang {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Erzeugt für 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} Rauch in einem Bereich. Alle Kreaturen, die in jenen Bereich kommen oder dort ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beginnen, müssen Proben auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen.
<indent=5%>- Scheitert die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf Zähigkeit, wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} für 2 Runden</indent>
<indent=5%>- Scheitert die Probe auf Stärke, wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} für 2 Runden</indent>
<indent=5%>- Scheitert die Probe auf Willenskraft, wird das Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g} für 2 Runden</indent>

Alle Kreaturen, die in den {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} dieser Granate kommen, müssen {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} bestehen.
-<indent=5%>Scheitert die Zähigkeit-Probe, wird das Ziel für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Beim Scheitern der Stärke-Probe – für 2 Runden {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Beim Scheitern der Willenskraft-Probe – für 2 Runden {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}verstört{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Toutes les créatures qui pénètrent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} générée par cette grenade doivent réussir des {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests{/g} d'Endurance, de Force et de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}</u>.
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test d'Endurance, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test de Force, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test de Force mentale, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
languages.original_text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Toutes les créatures qui pénètrent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} générée par cette grenade doivent réussir des {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'Endurance, de Force et de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}</u>.
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test d'Endurance, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test de Force, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test de Force mentale, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>

Toutes les créatures qui pénètrent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} générée par cette grenade doivent réussir des {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} liés à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c}.
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test lié à l'Endurance, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test lié à la Force, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>En cas d'échec du test lié à la Force Mentale, la cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} pendant 2 rounds.</indent>

languages.text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Toughness, Strength, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Toughness, Strength, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

languages.text:
Bu bombanın oluşturduğu {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanına{/g} giren tüm yaratıklar, −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} ceza puanına sahip Kuvvet, Dayanıklılık ve İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır.
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Dayanıklılık testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşir{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, Kuvvet testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hedef, İrade testini geçemezse 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygılanır{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
